Name: Male
Description: The capital city of Maldives, known for its bustling markets, vibrant culture, and stunning nearby resorts.

Name: Addu Atoll
Description: The southernmost atoll in the Maldives, known for its beautiful coral reefs, lagoons, and tropical beaches.

Name: Baa Atoll
Description: A UNESCO Biosphere Reserve known for its exceptional marine biodiversity, including manta rays and whale sharks.

Name: Raa Atoll
Description: An atoll in the northern Maldives, famous for its peaceful environment and crystal-clear waters perfect for diving and snorkeling.

Name: Noonu Atoll
Description: Known for its stunning uninhabited islands, Noonu Atoll offers secluded resorts and pristine beaches.

Name: Laccadive Islands
Description: Located in the Indian Ocean, these islands are known for their exceptional coral reefs, perfect for marine adventures.
